caption.p: Glutathione (GSH), superoxide dismutase (SOD), and glutathione-S-transferase (GST) level in the different treatment groups. DEN-treated groups showed a decreased level of GSH, SOD, and GST enzymes as compared to the control group ( p < 0.05). Treatment of 6-gingerol and DEN increased the levels of these enzymes considerably as compared to the DEN-treated group ( p < 0.05).
